catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 508
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: unsigned; lines of inscription written in silver against indigo blue paper; colorful brown and light green singe marks and tears along bottom
object_name: Fragment of a handscroll, mounted as hanging scroll
title: Fragment from Volume 53 of the Flower Garland Sutra, one of the “Burnt Sutra Fragments”
